name: phase-skip
description: Multi-phase with phase skip - verifies skipping phases works correctly after triage creates sub-issues

parent_issue.title: Multi-phase with phase skip
parent_issue.body:
## Description

A multi-phase feature where phase 2 will be manually skipped.

## Requirements

- Phase 1: Setup
- Phase 2: SKIPPED (will be manually set to Done)
- Phase 3: Final implementation

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Phase 1 completes
- [ ] Phase 2 is skipped
- [ ] Phase 3 completes
